item.title: Whats wrong with my ::starter?
item.dc:creator: @Fiire Fiirë
item.description:
@Fiire wrote:

darklink643:

so w8 ur saying u compiled and you got an error if so then where it says PLAYERNAME under that delte the space…

I dont get any errors, It just doesnt work![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 22, 2008, 05:06:33 pm[/size][hr]This is what it looks like…

[code]
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 200000);
addItem(392, 1000);
sendMessage(“You Have Started Your Adventure”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry; You cannot get another STARTER!”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to get a extra starter!! :p");

        }
    }                                                                   
	[/code]

and its between these!

[code]

}
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 200000);
addItem(392, 1000);
sendMessage(“You Have Started Your Adventure”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry; You cannot get another STARTER!”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to get a extra starter!! :p");

        }
    }                                                                   
	}*/

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cart”)){
sendMessage(“Command removed.”);
}[/code]
